ja395:7.4: kaṇṭhe kiṇikiṇāyati → kaṇṭhe kiṇakiṇāyati (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | kaṇṭhe kiṃnikilāyati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | idaṃ kaṇṭhe kiṇāyati (mr)
ja395:11.2: Kharaputtavaggo → senakavaggo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | khuraputtavaggo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | sūcivaggo (mr)
ja395:15.3: kharo ca → senako (bj) | sūci ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
